name: Japanese Cucumber Salad (Sunomono)
author: Celsia
summary: A delightfully tart and sweet salad that's great anytime. This will keep in the fridge for a few days and makes a great sweet snack when you're feeling the munchies!
ingredients: ¼ cup toasted sesame seeds, or to taste
directions: Partially peel cucumbers lengthwise, leaving thin green stripes around the cucumber
Scoop seeds from cucumber halves with a spoon
Slice cucumbers thinly and put in a bowl
Add salt to cucumber and mix with hand until cucumber is limp; set aside for 45 minutes
Transfer cucumbers to a strainer and squeeze as much liquid out as possible
Mix lemon juice, sugar, and vinegar together in a large bowl until the sugar dissolves
Add the drained cucumber and toss to coat
Spoon into small bowls and top each portion with toasted sesame seeds
